replies.body: Opinions? You can be savage! :D
replies.body_tagged: Opinions? You can be savage! :D

replies.body: You seem like a nice guy, and you are a growing leader. Leading a team isn't easy, and you are doing a pretty damn good job. You will learn as you go along, and hopefully NewDawn will prosper. Also, props for actually starting a new team.
